name: Drunk Or Dead 2: Prologue
description:
A vicious zombie plague has spread across the world, and the only cure is alcohol.
Protected by a killer hangover, mankind does whatever it takes to reclaim the world or just to take the best of life until it runs out.

BEST DEAL
[url]
Do you want to know where it all began and is it a fun game to play with friends?

Try Drunk or Dead 2: Prologue.

You'll get access to:
- an introduction to the Drunk or Dead lore,
- several in-game locations,
- multiple kinds of weapons,

Drunk Of Dead 2: Prologue is an introduction demo of Drunk or Dead 2, a campaign-based VR adventure for up to four players (co-op), with plenty of opportunities to hang out, shop, chat and drink between battles.

Prologue to the game Drunk or Dead 2, in which you will get acquainted with a brief history of what happened in the main game. In the prologue users will try new fun mechanics of the Drunk or Dead 2 universe, such as: turret shooting, new types of zombies, defending the hut from zombies and trying to mow zombies on the on the grain harvester.
